explosives.classification: Not classified (Materials of animal or vegetable origin), Classification not possible (Materials of mineral origin)
explosives.rationale: Materials of animal or vegetable origin: UNRTDG No. 1361 (CARBON, animal or vegetable origin, Class4.2, Packing Group II or III). Materials of mineral origin: no data available

flammable_gases.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

flammable_aerosols.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

oxidizing_gases.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

gases_under_pressure.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

flammable_liquids.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

flammable_solids.classification: Not classified (Materials of animal or vegetable origin), Classification not possible (Materials of mineral origin)
flammable_solids.rationale: It is based on Animal-and-plant materials: the UN number 1361 (CARBON, animal or vegetable origin, Class4.2, Packing Group IIorIII). Mineral materials: No data.

self_reactive_substances.classification: Not classified (Materials of animal or vegetable origin), Classification not possible (Materials of mineral origin)
self_reactive_substances.rationale: It is based on the Animals-and-plants system materials: UN number 1361 (CARBON, animal or vegetable origin, Class4.2, Packing Group IIorIII). Mineral systems materials: no data.

pyrophoric_liquids.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

pyrophoric_solids.classification: Not classified (Materials of animal or vegetable origin), Classification not possible (Materials of mineral origin)
pyrophoric_solids.rationale: Materials of animal-and-plant origin: It is based on the UN Number 1361 (CARBON, animal or vegetable origin, Class4.2, Packing Group IIorIII). Materials of mineral origin: No data.

self_heating_substances.classification: Category 1-2 (Materials of animal or vegetable origin), Classification not possible (Materials of mineral origin)
self_heating_substances.hazard_statement: Self-heating; may catch fire (Materials of animal or vegetable origin)
self_heating_substances.rationale: It is based on the Animals-and-plants system materials: UN number 1361 (CARBON, animal or vegetable origin, Class4.2, Packing Group IIorIII). Mineral systems materials: data without.

substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.hazard_name: Substances and mixtures which, in contact with water, emit flammable gases
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)
substances_mixtures_emit_flammable_gas_i.rationale: The chemical structure of the substance does not contain metals or metaloids(B, Si, P, Ge, As, Se, Sn, Sb, Te, Bi, Po, At).

oxidizing_liquids.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

oxidizing_solids.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)
oxidizing_solids.rationale: Containing no oxygen , chlorine and fluorine.

organic_peroxides.classification: Not applicable (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)

corrosive_to_metals.classification: Classification not possible (Materials of animal or vegetable origin, Materials of mineral origin)
corrosive_to_metals.rationale: Test methods applicable to solid substances are not available.

acute_toxicity_oral.rationale: SPECIES: Rat ENDPOINT: LD50 VALUE: 15400 mg/kg REFERENCE SOURCE: RTECS (2004)

acute_toxicity_dermal.rationale: Although there are data of >3 gm/kg (RTECS (2004)) of a rabbit, it cannot be specified as LD50 value.

carcinogenicity.rationale: Although we have the positive findings by the somatic cell in vivo genotoxicity study (the DNA adduct formation examination of the rat alveolar cells, and the rat alveolar cells hprt mutation examination)(DFGOTvol.18 (2002)), we have no data in which the positive result has been clearly shown in the in vitro mutagenicity test.

toxic_to_reproduction.rationale: It is based on 2B of IARC classification and 2nd group B of Japan Society for Occupational Health.

systemic_toxicity_repeat_exposure.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Single exposure

aspiration_hazard.hazard_name: Specific target organ toxicity - Repeated exposure
aspiration_hazard.hazard_statement: Cause damage to organs through prolonged or repeated exposure (lung)
aspiration_hazard.rationale: It is classified into Category 1 based on the pneumoconosis on humans (DFGOT vol.18 (2002)) and the influence on lungs (a epithelial hyperplasia, metaplasia, pulmonary fibrosis, and multiplication of alveolar cell etc.) (DFGOTvol.18 (2002)) in a rat inhalation test at the range of the guidance value Category 1.

acute_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Since it was suggested from 24-hour EC50>5600mg/L of Crustacea (Daphnia magna) (IUCLID, 2000) that relevant toxicity is not indicated in the water solubility (insoluble (HSDB, 2004)) of this substance, it carried out the outside of Category.

chronic_aquatic_toxicity.rationale: Classification not possible, since water-insolubule and no acute toxicity is reported within the saturated aqueous solution, and behavior in water and bioaccumulative potential are unknown.
